snippet.title: Sir Galgano - A Medieval Tale - Trailer on Steam
snippet.description:
Sir Galgano is a side-scrolling medieval beat’em up game with RPG elements.  

The game focuses on the hero, Sir Galgano Guidotti, well-know as Saint Galgano. Player battle the game’s many dangers with weapons and complete quests to acquire experience points, which is used to increase Sir Galgano‘s abilities and purchase equipment.

Inspiration was classic games like The King of Dragons, Rastan Saga, Knights of the Round and (obviously) Golden Axe.

Diary Development game: 
https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PL9hd1K79GH01ZsvdVKrmbEE82hfBpMFFb


More info:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1765250/Sir_Galgano__A_Medieval_Tale/

https://www.facebook.com/FucinaDelGranducato
https://www.fucinagranducato.com

Music by Hörspiel-Werkstatt Bad Hersfeld
